templateVersions.content:
given this example svg: <svg width="300" height="140" xmlns="https://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <text x="10" y="25" font-size="12" fill="#333">Entertainment</text> <rect x="120" y="10" width="90" height="20" fill="#63b075"/> <text x="220" y="25" font-size="12" fill="#333">$621.78</text> <text x="10" y="55" font-size="12" fill="#333">Groceries</text> <rect x="120" y="40" width="37" height="20" fill="#73b883"/> <text x="167" y="55" font-size="12" fill="#333">$253.75</text> <text x="10" y="85" font-size="12" fill="#333">Dining Out</text> <rect x="120" y="70" width="33" height="20" fill="#82c091"/> <text x="163" y="85" font-size="12" fill="#333">$227.68</text> <text x="10" y="115" font-size="12" fill="#333">Utilities</text> <rect x="120" y="100" width="19" height="20" fill="#92c89e"/> <text x="149" y="115" font-size="12" fill="#333">$128.37</text> </svg>
Create another svg for the following:{!$Input:VDS_Answer}.
